verses.verse: And Israel<WH3478> took his journey<WH5265> with all that he had<WH935>, and came to Beer-sheba<WH884>, and offered<WH2076> sacrifices<WH2077> unto the God<WH430> of his father<WH1> Isaac<WH3327>.
And God<WH430> spake<WH559> unto Israel<WH3478> in the visions<WH4759> of the night<WH3915>, and said<WH559>, Jacob<WH3290>, Jacob<WH3290>. And he said<WH559>, Here am I.
And he said<WH559>, I am God<WH410>, the God<WH430> of thy father<WH1>: fear<WH3372> not to go down<WH3381> into Egypt<WH4714>; for I will there make<WH7760> of thee a great<WH1419> nation<WH1471>:
I will go down<WH3381> with thee into Egypt<WH4714>; and I will also surely<WH5927> bring thee up<WH5927> again<WH3130>: and Joseph shall put<WH7896> his hand<WH3027> upon thine eyes<WH5869>.

And Jacob<WH3290> rose up<WH6965> from Beer-sheba<WH884>: and the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> carried<WH5375> Jacob<WH3290> their father<WH1>, and their little ones<WH2945>, and their wives<WH802>, in the wagons<WH5699> which Pharaoh<WH6547> had sent<WH7971> to carry him<WH5375>.

And they took<WH3947> their cattle<WH4735>, and their goods<WH7399>, which they had gotten<WH7408> in the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>, and came<WH935> into Egypt<WH4714>, Jacob<WH3290>, and all his seed with him<WH2233>:
his sons<WH1121>, and his sons<WH1121>' sons<WH1121> with him<WH1323>, his daughters, and his sons<WH1121>' daughters<WH1323>, and all his seed<WH2233> brought he<WH935> with him into Egypt<WH4714>.
And these are the names<WH8034> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, who came<WH935> into Egypt<WH4714>, Jacob<WH3290> and his sons<WH1121>: Reuben<WH7205>, Jacob<WH3290>'s first-born<WH1060>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205>: Hanoch<WH2585>, and Pallu<WH6396>, and Hezron<WH2696>, and Carmi<WH3756>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Simeon<WH8095>: Jemuel<WH3223>, and Jamin<WH3226>, and Ohad<WH161>, and Jachin<WH3199>, and Zohar<WH6714>, and Shaul<WH7586> the son<WH1121> of a Canaanitish woman<WH3669>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878>: Gershon<WH1648>, Kohath<WH6955>, and Merari<WH4847>.

And the sons<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063>: Er<WH6147>, and Onan<WH209>, and Shelah<WH7956>, and Perez<WH6557>, and Zerah<WH2226>; but Er<WH6147> and Onan<WH209> died<WH4191> in the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>. And the sons<WH1121> of Perez<WH6557> were Hezron<WH2696> and Hamul<WH2538>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Issachar<WH3485>: Tola<WH8439>, and Puvah<WH6312>, and Iob<WH3102>, and Shimron<WH8110>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Zebulun<WH2074>: Sered<WH5624>, and Elon<WH356>, and Jahleel<WH3177>.

These are the sons<WH1121> of Leah<WH3812>, whom she bare<WH3205> unto Jacob<WH3290> in Paddan-aram<WH6307>, with his daughter<WH1323> Dinah<WH1783>: all the souls<WH5315> of his sons<WH1121> and his daughters<WH1323> were thirty<WH7970> and three<WH7969>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410>: Ziphion<WH6837>, and Haggi<WH2291>, Shuni<WH7764>, and Ezbon<WH675>, Eri<WH6179>, and Arodi<WH722>, and Areli<WH692>.

And the sons<WH1121> of Asher<WH836>: Imnah<WH3232>, and Ishvah<WH3438>, and Ishvi<WH3440>, and Beriah<WH1283>, and Serah<WH8294> their sister<WH269>; and the sons<WH1121> of Beriah<WH1283>: Heber<WH2268>, and Malchiel<WH4439>.
These are the sons<WH1121> of Zilpah<WH2153>, whom Laban<WH3837> gave<WH5414> to Leah<WH3812> his daughter<WH1323>; and these she bare<WH3205> unto Jacob<WH3290>, even sixteen<WH6240> souls<WH5315>.
The sons<WH1121> of Rachel<WH7354> Jacob<WH3290>'s wife<WH802>: Joseph<WH3130> and Benjamin<WH1144>.

And unto Joseph<WH3130> in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> were born<WH3205> Manasseh<WH4519> and Ephraim<WH669>, whom Asenath<WH621>, the daughter<WH1323> of Poti-phera<WH6319> priest<WH3548> of On<WH204>, bare unto him<WH3205>.

And the sons<WH1121> of Benjamin<WH1144>: Bela<WH1106>, and Becher<WH1071>, and Ashbel<WH788>, Gera<WH1617>, and Naaman<WH5283>, Ehi<WH278>, and Rosh<WH7220>, Muppim<WH4649>, and Huppim<WH2650>, and Ard<WH714>.
These are the sons<WH1121> of Rachel<WH7354>, who were born<WH3205> to Jacob<WH3290>: all the souls<WH5315> were fourteen<WH702>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Dan<WH1835>: Hushim<WH2366>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Naphtali<WH5321>: Jahzeel<WH3183>, and Guni<WH1476>, and Jezer<WH3337>, and Shillem<WH8006>.

These are the sons<WH1121> of Bilhah<WH1090>, whom Laban<WH3837> gave<WH5414> unto Rachel<WH7354> his daughter<WH1323>, and these she bare<WH3205> unto Jacob<WH3290>: all the souls<WH5315> were seven<WH7651>.

All the souls<WH5315> that came<WH935> with Jacob<WH3290> into Egypt<WH4714>, that came out<WH3318> of his loins<WH3409>, besides Jacob<WH3290>'s sons<WH1121>' wives<WH802>, all the souls<WH5315> were threescore<WH8346> and six<WH8337>;

and the sons<WH1121> of Joseph<WH3130>, who were born<WH3205> to him in Egypt<WH4714>, were two<WH8147> souls<WH5315>: all the souls<WH5315> of the house<WH1004> of Jacob<WH3290>, that came<WH935> into Egypt<WH4714>, were threescore and ten<WH7657>.
And he sent<WH7971> Judah<WH3063> before him<WH6440> unto Joseph<WH3130>, to show<WH3384> the way<WH6440> before him unto Goshen<WH1657>; and they came<WH935> into the land<WH776> of Goshen<WH1657>.

And Joseph<WH3130> made ready<WH631> his chariot<WH4818>, and went up<WH5927> to meet<WH7125> Israel<WH3478> his father<WH1>, to Goshen<WH1657>; and he presented<WH7200> himself unto him<WH5307>, and fell on his neck<WH6677>, and wept<WH1058> on his neck<WH6677> a good while<WH5750>.
And Israel<WH3478> said<WH559> unto Joseph<WH3130>, Now<WH6471> let me die<WH4191>, since<WH310> I have seen<WH7200> thy face<WH6440>, that thou art yet<WH5750> alive<WH2416>.

And Joseph<WH3130> said<WH559> unto his brethren<WH251>, and unto his father<WH1>'s house<WH1004>, I will go up<WH5927>, and tell<WH5046> Pharaoh<WH6547>, and will say<WH559> unto him<WH251>, My brethren, and my father<WH1>'s house<WH1004>, who were in the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>, are come unto me<WH935>;
and the men<WH582> are shepherds<WH7462>, for they have been keepers of cattle<WH4735>; and they have brought<WH935> their flocks<WH6629>, and their herds<WH1241>, and all that they have.
And it shall come to pass<WH6547>, when Pharaoh shall call<WH7121> you<WH559>, and shall say, What is your occupation<WH4639>?

that ye shall say<WH559>, Thy servants<WH5650> have been keepers<WH582> of cattle<WH4735> from our youth<WH5271> even until now<WH1>, both we, and our fathers: that ye may dwell<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of Goshen<WH1657>; for every shepherd<WH7462> is an abomination<WH8441> unto the Egyptians<WH4714>.
